bill.title: Public school construction projects; require major projects to meet USGBC's LEED silver standard.
bill.description: An Act To Require All Major Facility Projects Of Public School Districts Receiving Any Funding In A State Or Local Capital Budget To Be Designed, Constructed And Certified To At Least The United States Green Building Council's Leed Silver Standard; To Provide That A Public School District May Determine That The Leed Silver Standard Is Not Practicable For A Project; To Provide That, If Leed Standards Are Not Followed For The Project, The Public School District Shall Report These Reasons To The Department Of Education; To Authorize The Department Of Education To Adopt Rules And Regulations To Implement This Act; And For Related Purposes.
